Event.Message: A problem occurred while running the BitLocker Drive Preparation Tool. Error Code: %1 Error Text: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A problem occurred while running the BitLocker Drive Preparation Tool. Error Code: %1 Error Text: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A problem occurred while running the BitLocker Drive Preparation Tool. Error Code: %1 Error Text: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A problem occurred while running the BitLocker Drive Preparation Tool. Error Code: %1 Error Text: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A problem occurred while running the BitLocker Drive Preparation Tool. Error Code: %1 Error Text: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The BitLocker Drive Configuration Tool successfully completed. The target hard disk is ready for BitLocker.
Found a candidate volume for shrink or merge. Shrinkable: %1 Candidate Volume Name: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Shrinkable" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ContainsWinRE" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VolumeSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeFreeSpace" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeMaxShrinkSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeFlags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="DriveLetter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Found an unallocated extent large enough for the requested size. Offset: %3 Size: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DiskId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Type" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Offset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="Size" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Disk extent located on the hard disk containing the System Drive. Offset: %3 Size: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DiskId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Type" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Offset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="Size" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: Command-line parameters for the BitLocker Drive Preparation Tool: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RawCommandLine" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ShowUsage" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="DisplayDriveInfo" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="TargetDriveLetter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TargetAction" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewSystemDriveLetter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ShrinkSize" inType="win:Int64" outType="xs:long"/> <data name="QuietMode" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="AutoRestart" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Drive will shrink and new active drive %6 will be created. Volume Name: %1 Shrink Size: %5 Bytes
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriveLetter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ShrinkSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NewDriveLetter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: New drive %3 will be created from unallocated space Unallocated extent offset: %1 New partition size: %2 Bytes
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ExtentOffset" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NewPartitionSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="NewDriveLetter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Drive will be set as the new system drive Volume Name: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriveLetter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Detected Windows Recovery Environment volume Volume Path: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="WinREVolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriveLetter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: A volume failed to meet the requirements for a target volume. Volume Name: %3 Reason: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MessageCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="MessageText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VolumeName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DriveLetter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DiskNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PartitionNumber" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
